events.headline: Global password security
events.text: Password protection has been globally increased.

events.headline: Global physical security
events.text: Physical security has been globally increased.

events.headline: ISP's solve DDOS dilemma
events.text: After many years of DDOS attacks running rampant in society, a new network protocol has allowed ISP's to rid themselves of this long-standing issue. DDOS attacks are now officially a thing of the past.
